entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow near the Ogilvie mountains early this morning. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains this morning and early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 70 near the Richardson mountains this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
